# attributedTitle

**Instance Property**

An attributed version of the chart title.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var attributedTitle: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set the value of this property, the system uses this value instead of [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXChartDescriptor/title].

## Specifying the chart title

- **title**: The title of the chart.
title: attributedTitle
